items.sentence: Tom is in the backyard, playing with his children.
I couldn't answer the first question Tom asked me.
When I got up today, my throat felt a little sore.
A time will come when you will regret your action.
Tom got off the elevator and headed to his office.
Tom stayed on the bus, but everybody else got off.
Tom was at the nightclub the night it burned down.
Tom and I've been spending a lot of time together.
Tom said that he wanted to be buried in Australia.
Tom said that he heard that I was going to Boston.
